headline: Marshalls Expands Efforts to Help Women Access the Good Stuff™ in Life
summary: Marshalls (NYSE: TJX) today announces the expansion of the Marshalls Good Stuff Social Club to three new cities across the country and introduces engaging short-form video content to its online Tools & Resources Hub. Now in its third year, Marshalls remains dedicated to its mission of helping to close the access gap – the lack of access to tools, resources, and communities that help enable women to live the life they want, whatever that means to them.
